subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. teams that jettison franchise players without receiving equal value often fall into disarray and are forced to start anew. The Philadelphia 76ers are hoping for better things after trading Allen Iverson.
snippet: N.B.A. teams that jettison franchise players without receiving equal value often fall into disarray and are forced to start anew. The Philadelphia 76ers are hoping for better things after trading Allen Iverson.
